CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Meridian Dynamics relative to Verdant Ventures?
SRP.A: Meridian Dynamics is {below} Verdant Ventures in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total turnover rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Zenith Enterprises}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total turnover rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Ironclad Industries}.

VE.Q: What is Verdant Ventures's Turnover Rate in 1958?
VE.A: Verdant Ventures's turnover rate in 1958 is {15.17} %.

VE.Q: What is Ironclad Industries's Turnover Rate in 1959?
VE.A: Ironclad Industries's turnover rate in 1959 is {13.42} %.

VE.Q: What is AstraCorp's Turnover Rate in 1974?
What are the turnover rate of Zenith Enterprises, Ironclad Industries, and Verdant Ventures in 1979?
VE.A: Zenith Enterprises's turnover rate is {100} %, Ironclad Industries's turnover rate is {1.93} %, Verdant Ventures's turnover rate is {5.77} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Turnover Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum turnover rate is {1.13} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Turnover Rate in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum turnover rate is {100.00} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Turnover Rate level recorded for AstraCorp?
What is the lowest Turnover Rate level recorded for AstraCorp?
EVJ.A: AstraCorp's lowest recorded level is approximately {14.76} % in {1958}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Turnover Rate?
SC.A: The average total turnover rate is {132.10} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Turnover Rate go below 94.77 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Turnover Rate fall between 119.84 and 132.46 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Turnover Rate exceed 157.53 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Between 1967 and 1974, was the average total Turnover Rate higher or lower than between 1959 and 1979?
NC.A: The average total turnover rate between 1967 and 1974 was {lower} than between 1959 and 1979.

NC.Q: Between 1963 and 1970, was the average total Turnover Rate higher or lower than between 1967 and 1972?
NC.A: The average total turnover rate between 1963 and 1970 was {lower} than between 1967 and 1972.

NC.Q: Between 1963 and 1972, was the average total Turnover Rate higher or lower than between 1964 and 1969?
NC.A: The average total turnover rate between 1963 and 1972 was {higher} than between 1964 and 1969.

NC.Q: Between 1967 and 1980, was the average total Turnover Rate higher or lower than between 1978 and 1980?
NC.A: The average total turnover rate between 1967 and 1980 was {lower} than between 1978 and 1980.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Zenith Enterprises} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {Ironclad Industries, Verdant Ventures, Meridian Dynamics, AstraCorp, Zenith Enterprises}.
